lead_paragraph: Former England batsman Kevin Pietersen will not be recalled for this year's World Twenty20 in India, captain Eoin Morgan was quoted on Monday as saying.

headline.print_headline: Pietersen Won't Be Selected for World Twenty20-Morgan
headline.main: Pietersen Won't Be Selected for World Twenty20-Morgan

snippet: Former England batsman Kevin Pietersen will not be recalled for this year's World Twenty20 in India, captain Eoin Morgan was quoted on Monday as saying....
